    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_93078</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The first battery</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die erste Batterie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La première batterie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A primeira bateria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La prima batteria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πρώτη μπαταρία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La primera batería</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the first battery was a series of cells consisting of zinc and copper plates separated by a piece of paper soaked in salt.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">battery</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper plate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Insulator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zinc plate</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die erste Batterie 
eine Reihe Zellen war, die aus den Zink- und Kupferplatten bestehen, 
die durch einen Papierstreifen getränkt im Salz getrennt wurden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la première 
batterie était une série de cellules se composant des plats de zinc 
et de en cuivre séparés par un morceau de papier imbibé en sel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a primeira bateria 
era uma série das pilhas que consistem nas placas do zinco e do cobre
separadas por uma parte de papel embebida no sal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la prima batteria 
era una serie di cellule che consistono delle piastre del rame e dello
zinco separate da pezzo di carta impregnato in sale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η πρώτη μπαταρία ήταν
μια σειρά κυττάρων που αποτελούνται από τα πιάτα ψευδάργυρου και
χαλκού που χωρίστηκαν από ένα κομμάτι του χαρτί που ενυδατώθηκε
στο άλας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la primera batería
era una serie de células que consistían en las placas del cinc y del
cobre separadas por un pedazo de papel remojado en sal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Batterie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kupferne Platte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Isolierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zinkplatte</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
